 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָדַב‎</span> **verb** ==incite, impel== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***call impel, incite*** (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be noble, willing, generous*** is denominative from [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> compare] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָדִיב‎</span> according to [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB § 125 e</sup>); VIII. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***ready, willing***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nidbu***</u></abbr>, ***freewill-offering*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 448</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְדַב‎</span> ***be willing*** Pa\`el, Ithpa\`al; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נדב‎</span> ***inciting, instigation*** [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Sendsch. 60</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָדַב‎</span> [[Exod.35.29|Exod 35:29]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽדְבָה‎</span> v[[Exod.35.21|Exod 35:21]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִדְּבֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Exod.25.2|Exod 25:2]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר נָדַב לִבּוֺ‎</span> [[Exod.25.2|Exod 25:2]] ***whose heart incited*** compare [[Exod.35.29|Exod 35:29]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ‎</span> [[Exod.35.21|Exod 35:21]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]). **Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְנַדַּבְתִּי‎</span> [[1Chr.29.27|1Chr 29:27]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְנַדְּבוּ‎</span> [[Ezra.2.68|Ezra 2:68]]; [[1Chr.29.9|1Chr 29:9]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְנַדְּבוּ‎</span> v[[1Chr.29.6|1Chr 29:6]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְנַדֵּב‎</span> [[Judg.5.2|Judg 5:2]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְנַדֶּבֿ‎</span> [[1Chr.29.17|1Chr 29:17]] sf <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְנַדְּבָם‎</span> v[[1Chr.29.9|1Chr 29:9]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְנַדֵּב‎</span> [[Ezra.3.5|Ezra 3:5]] + 2.t.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְנַדְּבִים‎</span> [[Judg.5.9|Judg 5:9]]; [[Neh.11.2|Neh 11:2]] — 

**1.** ***volunteer*** for war [[Judg.5.2|Judg 5:2]]; [[Judg.5.9|Judg 5:9]] for service of other kinds [[2Chr.17.16|2Chr 17:16]]; [[Neh.11.2|Neh 11:2]]. 

**2.** ***offer freewill-offerings*** for the first temple [[1Chr.29.5|1Chr 29:5]]; [[1Chr.29.6|1Chr 29:6]]; [[1Chr.29.9|1Chr 29:9]] (twice in verse); [[1Chr.29.14|1Chr 29:14]]; [[1Chr.29.17|1Chr 29:17]] (twice in verse); for the second [[Ezra.1.4|Ezra 1:4]]; [[Ezra.2.68|Ezra 2:68]]; [[Ezra.3.5|Ezra 3:5]] (compare Biblical Aramaic).
